29#include <libelf.h>
30
31#include "_libelf.h"
32
33__RCSID("$NetBSD: elf_memory.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:42 christos Exp $");
34ELFTC_VCSID("Id: elf_memory.c 3013 2014-03-23 06:16:59Z jkoshy ");
35
36Elf *
37elf_memory(char *image, size_t sz)
38{
39 if (LIBELF_PRIVATE(version) == EV_NONE) {
40 LIBELF_SET_ERROR(SEQUENCE, 0);
41 return (NULL);
42 }
43
44 if (image == NULL || sz == 0) {
45 LIBELF_SET_ERROR(ARGUMENT, 0);
46 return (NULL);
47 }
48
49 return (_libelf_memory((unsigned char *) image, sz, 1));
50}
51
